message:
I have a good new IT social business idea and I need sponsor.
Is there is any honest & respected Sponsors anyone know
#Entrepreneurship
#Entrepreneur

data.message: for a start, no need to be so secretive, nobody is going to steal your million dollar idea
Expected Budget ? Expected Revenue Duration ? Expected Time Plan?
Facebook is not a stolen idea, they took something that was done a million times and did it better. I'm sure your idea though is much better than facebook.
Facebook is not a stolen idea, they took something that was done a million times and did it better. I'm sure your idea though is much better than facebook.
Facebook is not a stolen idea, they took something that was done a million times and did it better. I'm sure your idea though is much better than facebook.
there is many ways to fund and sponsor, for example search for Cairo Angels, Fat6lap, or create a prototype and use online funds like kickstarter, indiagogo

I can be as your Mentor if you don't want. But as the guys said. Most of the existing apps was resolved 10 years ago so it's not a secret. and no one can steal it. because if they steal the idea they didn't steal your mind ;) 

Now before you expose anything ave you done a proper:
1. Market Research
2. Validate your business model with normal people.
3. Do you have an estimate on how much you would need to get it done?

See these questions has nothing to do with the idea but it reflect if you have done your homework correctly or not.
